OpenCTI — Threat Intelligence

What it is: An open platform to collect, model, share, and analyze cyber threat intelligence using the STIX2 data model.

Features

  • Incident and campaign creation.
  • Indicator and observable management.
  • Graph visualization for entity relationships.

Quick Access
